scripts.postinstall: curl -L https://github.com/yt-dlp/yt-dlp/releases/latest/download/yt-dlp_linux -o yt-dlp_linux && chmod +x yt-dlp_linux && curl -L https://johnvansickle.com/ffmpeg/releases/ffmpeg-release-amd64-static.tar.xz -o ffmpeg.tar.xz && mkdir -p ffmpeg_temp && tar -xJf ffmpeg.tar.xz -C ffmpeg_temp --strip-components=1 && mv ffmpeg_temp/ffmpeg ./ffmpeg && mv ffmpeg_temp/ffprobe ./ffprobe && chmod +x ffmpeg ffprobe && rm -rf ffmpeg_temp ffmpeg.tar.xz
